rows.label: tlk00030105_msg0001
rows.name:
Oh, ooh! Glad to see you made
it back, mo! Most importantly,
you seem uninjured!

rows.label: tlk00030105_msg0002
rows.name:
I thought you'd sunk along
with the ancient ship, so I'm
happy to see you safe, mo!

rows.label: tlk00030105_msg0003
rows.name:
From now on, I'll be sure to
favor you, Rex, so I expect
you to work hard for me, mo!!

rows.label: tlk00030105_msg0101
rows.name:
Mo, so busy, mo... My schedule's
a little off, so I need to
readjust my plans, mo.
